Hame agar kai saari classes ko ek class mein combine karna ho to then we use @apply directive in index.class .newClassName{ @apply text-white bg-yello-500 ........ } If we want tailwind utility classes to be able to override the styles of our custom class then we will to place this between @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; But using layer directive we can write our custom class at the bottom and specify after which layer we want to place our custom class @layer base/components/utilities { .newClassName{ @apply text-white bg-yello-500 ........ } } If we want to apply global styles in tailwind we do this in index.css. After the three layers write, :root{ @apply ......... }
